message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $150. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do a bit better than $120, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make a small concession, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $140?
I'm still really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stick to my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. How about we meet at $145?
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $128?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob. I can do one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. How about we meet at $142?
This is my final offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider buying from John for $120.
